events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund for the item as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and to proceed with the next steps.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I would like a refund because the item does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please reply if you need any further assistance.
Since there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
